external_games.name: Tabletop Simulator - Dawn of the Zeds

name: Tabletop Simulator: Dawn of the Zeds
summary: You must lead the good citizens and emerging heroes of these communities to halt the Zeds' advances by (re)killing them, attempt to coordinate the discovery of a cure to this vile scourge, and preserve as much of the area and as many of its inhabitants as possible. There's no time to lose...
